title: Amita Maheshwari of Kedaara Capital quits
description: Before her tenure at Kedaara, Amita served as President and Head of HR for Star India and subsequently as the Head of HR for The Walt Disney Company and Star TV, which included Disney Hotstar, across the Asia-Pacific, Middle East, and India for a span of 14 years. During her tenure, she oversaw HR operations in 27 markets in Asia, including India, China, Japan, Korea, and other regions.
content: (You can now subscribe to our Economic Times WhatsApp channel)
